Text: Oñ i leatu, o̩jo̩ʼka le̩, abu kʼi nako̩ amone̩ e̩wñ ef unyi O̩jo̩, kʼi nʼUche̩nyo̩ aje̩ru ma, amagboji amatama kpai amako̩takada manyʼabogijo lewabanʼo;
oñ ma ko̩la, ma ka ñw u, kakini, E̩ ka ñw a, ef o̩da e̩wñ e̩ che e̩wñ-i taa? Abe̩k e̩ne̩ dʼo̩da kide̩ ñw e̩?
Oñ i dohi ka ñwu ma, kakini, Omi ñʼatʼume̩ ene o̩laʼka ge̩; ku me̩ ka ñwu mi:
Baptism e-Jo̩n le̩ fa, efojale i kwo? abe̩k i kwʼugbo amone̩?
Oñ ma kwolo̩la kpʼo̩la-ma kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼa kakini, I kwʼefojale, i akakini, Tode̩wñ me̩ ma ke̩do̩nʼo̩la-wñ n?
I la che̩wñ kʼa akakini, I kwʼugbo amone̩, amone̩-i chaka arokuta ñw a, todu ama cheke̩do̩no ka ku Jo̩n chʼakache̩.
Taku ma dohi ka kʼama ma ugbo kʼi kwo n.
Taku Jisus ka ñwu ma kakini, Omi la aka ef o̩da e̩wñ kʼu nache e̩wñ-i ñwu me̩ ni ge̩.
Tak i chane̩ ekpʼita kide̩ ñw amone̩ le̩ kakini, E̩ne̩ ʼka fʼuche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma lo, oñ i mʼu du nyʼamaluche̩ o̩wo̩, tak i le tʼane̩ omune̩ kʼi kpo̩kpe̩ nana o̩mo̩.
Tak iko-wñ i fʼaduʼka kpuche̩ nyʼugbo amaluche̩ le̩, kʼama ki kʼe̩ro ñw u kwef e̩ro uche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma le̩. Amaluche̩ le̩ muda fʼu gwo, oñ ma fʼu kpuche̩ kwʼo̩mo̩ o̩wo̩ ofo.
Tak i ño̩ kpe̩ adu omune̩ ge̩: oñ ma ño̩ fʼowñ le̩ gwo ge̩, ma la fʼu chukata, ma fʼu kpe̩ kwʼo̩mo̩ o̩wo̩ ofo ge̩.
Tak i fʼe̩ke̩ta kpe̩ ge̩: oñ ma ño̩ fʼe-le̩ chagbe, ma mʼu du rikpolo dufu.
Tak odu uche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma le̩ kakini, E̩wñ nache? Nakpe̩ o̩ma ufe̩do̩-mi; ukani ma adiba ñw u.
Ama abu kʼamaluche̩ le̩ fʼowñ li ma chane̩ elo̩la kpʼo̩la-ma kakini, E̩ne̩ ki aje̩ e̩wñ ogu ata-wñ de̩-i; a ki fʼu kpa, todu kʼe̩wñ-o̩gu le̩ ki mud e-wa.
Taku ma mʼu du ro̩ kwef uche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma le̩ tʼo̩do̩da, oñ ma fʼu kpa. Todule̩ e̩wñ odu uche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma le̩ ache ma ta?
I awa kʼi fʼamaluche̩ le̩ kpa rinyo̩, tak i adʼuche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma le̩ ñw abomune̩. Oñ abu ku ma gbo̩, ma kakini, O̩jo̩ ki kpo̩na.
Ama i cheju go ma, i kakini, Mak e̩wñ chʼe-ki che̩ko̩tane̩ kide̩ kakini,
E̩ne̩ du ki awane̩ bʼoj okuta kide̩ ma, i age̩ye̩ge̩ye̩ge̩; oñ e̩ne̩ kʼokuta-i awane̩ abʼo ma, i afʼu kwu ebutu.
Tak amako̩takada kpai amagboji amatama feju ku ma ko o̩wo̩ nyʼowñ o̩la ef auwa kide̩ gbage̩de̩; ma la railo amone̩; todu ma chema ka kʼugbo ma oñ i kpʼita kide̩.
Taku ma feju bʼo̩ le, ma la fʼamone̩ kpuche̩ anyo̩ge̩ jo̩, ma chakpaine̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼama chʼabo̩kpakpa, todu kʼama ki gwonyʼo̩la-wñ, todu kʼi nʼugbo ku ma amʼowñ du ñw agboji kpai o̩da igo̩bina.
Ma la tʼowñ ene kakini, Akone̩wñ, a chema kakini, E̩ ko̩la, e̩ laño̩ akone̩ e̩wñ tʼo̩kpakpa, e̩ la nʼe̩nejuma n, chai o̩na O̩jo̩ e̩ kʼone̩ ochochi:
o̩da aje̩ ñw a te̩ o̩ko̩ ñwu Sisa? abe̩k i aje̩ n?
Ama abu kʼi mʼibe ugbeju-ma i ka ñwu ma kakini,
Me̩ dʼoliaʼka ña mi, ojibo e̩ne̩ kpai olubutu e̩ne̩ jʼo̩la-wñ? Oñ ma kakini, E-Sisa.
Tak i ka ñwu ma kakini, Maku me̩ dʼe̩wñ e-Sisa ñwu Sisa, e̩wñ e-O̩jo̩ me̩ ki la du ñw O̩jo̩.
Iñmi-ma la wo̩ egwo̩nyʼo̩la kʼi ka le̩ eju amone̩ n. Taku ma kwoyaye noj ohi-wñ, oñ ma jo̩ chii.
Tak abo iche̩ka ef amaSadiusi wʼugbo-wñ, owñ chʼabo ku ma ka kʼudajikwane̩ do̩mo̩ n;
oñ ma tʼowñ ene kakini, Akone̩wñ, Mose̩s ko̩lubutu ñw a, kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼo̩maye one̩ kʼi nʼo̩ya leku, kʼi ma la nʼo̩ma n todu kʼo̩maye-wñ ki mʼo̩ya-wñ le̩ du, kʼi dʼugbe̩ tane̩ ñw o̩maye-wñ.
Todule̩ amo̩maye mebie do̩mo̩: tak e-ejodudu fʼo̩ya ne̩ oñ i leku, i la nʼo̩ma n;
tak e-ekeji
kpai e-e̩ke̩ta mʼowñ du; alu le̩ amamebie ne̩, ma la tʼo̩ma du no̩ tane̩ n, oñ ma leku,
anubi-wñ onobule̩ le̩ ño̩ leku ge̩.
Todule̩ ef udajikwane̩ e̩ne̩ i achʼo̩ya-wñ ef uma? Todu amamebie le̩ dʼowñ chʼo̩ya.
Taku Jisus ka ñwu ma kakini, Amo̩ma o̩kpanachi kide̩ ane̩ o̩ya, ma laño̩ ko ma kpo̩ko̩ ge̩:
ama abo ku ma fuñwa ku ma nyo̩ bo̩jo̩ ku ma tʼo̩kpanachi e-le̩ kpai udajikwane̩ kwef abo ki ku, nʼo̩ya n, ma la ko ma kpo̩ko̩ n;
todu ma la neke ño̩ ku ge̩ n: todu ma chʼokujo̩ kpai amonuche̩ O̩jo̩; ma la chʼamo̩ma O̩jo̩, abu ku ma chʼamo̩ma udajikwane̩.
I muda chʼe-ku ma ako abo ki ku kwane̩, i chaka che Mose̩s dʼoji e-le̩ dufu ugbo oli ye̩e̩le̩ le̩, abu kʼi kakini, Ondu, O̩jo̩ e-Ebraham, kpai O̩jo̩ e-Aise̩k, kpai O̩jo̩ e-Jeko̩b.
Owñ la chʼO̩jo̩ e-abo ki ku n, chai e-abo ki deju: todu o̩chaka-ma adeju ñw owñ.
Oñ iche̩ka ef amako̩takada le̩ dohi kakini, Akone̩wñ, o̩me̩me̩le̩ e̩ ka le̩.
Todu ma gbe̩do̩ etʼowñ ene tʼe-le̩ le ge̩ n.
Tak i ka ñwu ma kakini, Abile ku ma ka ku Kraist chʼO̩ma Defid ta?
Todu Defid onugo ka ef o̩takada Eli kʼi ko̩ dʼO̩jo̩ le̩ kakini,
Gbogbo tak u kʼame̩nebi-we̩ chʼuke̩re̩no e̩re̩-we̩.
Todule̩ Defid dʼowñ ko̩ Ondu, abile kʼi ño̩ chʼo̩ma-wñ ge̩?
Oñ abu kʼamone̩ le̩ chaka nʼeti agbo̩ i ka ñw amako̩che̩-wñ kakini,
Me̩ namʼo̩la-me̩ ne̩ ugbo amako̩takada e-ki dʼuma e̩do̩ ku ma nyi otogbo lile alule̩ ku ma laño̩ che̩do̩ ugwa ef aja, kpai ugugu ojima ef unyi ujeju, kpai uña ojima ugbo idina,
e-ku ma mʼunyi amo̩yaukuo̩ko̩ ko je̩, tak ukpa ku ma ache chʼechadua jiji. Abo-i ajʼabi ololo tule.
